thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com
thread.title: John Foster
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by John Foster

author: John Foster
title: John Foster
text: Using SkyLux Travel I saved about 25% of the lowest fare I could find on my own from the usual travel booking sites and the airlines directly. I got exactly what I was expecting. My agent Travis provided quick responses to my questions and reQuote: d me for the multiple scenarios I gave him.Travis took care of my special meal request within a few minutes after I tried unsuccessfully for a half hour to order it through the airline directly. I have no complaints, everything went according to plan. My entire experience was pleasant.
